dmca.title: [ABUSE] Re: Cease and Desist and Notice of DMCA Claim of Infringement [Notice ID: 181
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 17, 2005 1:11 PM
To: antipiracy@titanmedia.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Re: Cease and Desist and Notice of DMCA Claim of
Infringement [Notice ID: 1816273]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

atc> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
atc> Hash: SHA1

atc> To:
atc> Registered Agent for: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
atc> 1333 Stemmons Frwy - Suite 110




atc> Notice ID: 1816273


atc> From: Gill Sperlein, General Counsel, Titan Media, Inc.

atc> Date: 17 Jan 2005 16:50:15 GMT

atc> Re:     Notice of DMCA Claim of Infringement

atc> The above-referenced entity is hereby given notice valid
atc> under the DMCA copyright infringement notification requirements
atc> (17 U.S.C. 512).  I am the designated agent of the registered
atc> owner of the copyrights for the images and/or audio/visual works
atc> listed below. I believe your subscriber or account holder,
atc> identified below by the infringing IP address(es), used these
atc> works, at the dates and times cited below in a manner that was
atc> not authorized by the owner of the copyrights, its agent, or the
atc> law.

atc> I certify under penalty of perjury that I have a good faith
atc> belief the information contained in this notification is accurate
atc> to the best of my knowledge, and that I am authorized to act on
atc> behalf of the owner of the aforementioned copyright-protected
atc> materials.

atc> The verified and documented infringements listed below were
atc> traced to URLs and/or IP addresses controlled by your company. We
atc> demand that, upon receipt of this notification of claimed
atc> infringement, you expeditiously notify the subscriber or account
atc> holder to whom you assigned the IP address(es) on the date(s)
atc> listed and demand that he or she immediately remove the
atc> infringing material and cease and desist trading or sharing TITAN
atc> Media property.  Under 17 U.S.C. 512(i), service providers are
atc> not eligible for the limitations on liability established by 17
atc> U.S.C. 512 [including those established in subsection (a)] unless
atc> they have adopted and reasonably implemented, and informed
atc> subscribers and account holders a policy that provides for the
atc> termination in appropriate circumstances of subscribers and
atc> account holders who are repeat infringers.  Informing subscribers
atc> and account holders of acts of infringement is a crucial element
atc> to a policy providing for the termination of repeat infringers.

atc> This letter does not constitute an exhaustive statement of
atc> TITAN Media's legal position, nor is it a waiver of any of our
atc> rights and/or remedies in this or any other matter, all of which
atc> are expressly reserved.  Your immediate attention to this matter
atc> is expected and appreciated.

atc> When responding to this communication, please retain the
atc> Subject Notice ID number in the Subject field.

atc> You may receive a subpoena requiring you to provide the
atc> name and other identifying information for this subscriber and
atc> are therefore requested to retain all files and documents
atc> necessary to recover that data.

atc> NOTE TO ISP:  PLEASE FORWARD THIS ENTIRE MESSAGE TO THE
atc> SUBSCRIBER OR ACCOUNT HOLDER.  THIS MAY ENABLE US TO RESOLVE THE
atc> ISSUE AND ARRANGE FOR RESTITUTION WITHOUT FILING SUIT OR ISSUING
atc> A SUBPOENA TO YOU.

atc> NOTE TO SUBSCRIBER OR ACCOUNT HOLDER:  YOU ARE AT RISK OF
atc> BEING SUED FOR YOUR ILLEGAL ACTIONS.  TO DETERMINE HOW YOU MAY BE
atc> ABLE TO AVOID A LAWSUIT, REFER TO www.TitanLegal.com.



atc> Sincerely,



atc> D. Gill Sperlein
atc> General Counsel, TITAN Media Inc.
atc> 121 Capp Street, Suite 200
atc> San Francisco, CA 94110

atc> 415-487-1211 X32

atc> Notice ID: 1816273

atc> Infringing Files that must be removed and/or blocked from access are:

atc> Title: Tourist Trade
atc> Infringement Source: FastTrack
atc> Infringement Timestamp: 15 Jan 2005 03:45:46 GMT
atc> Infringement Last Documented: 15 Jan 2005 03:45:46 GMT
atc> Infringer Username: KazaaLiteK++@KaZaA
atc> Infringing Filename: Gay Porn - TITAN - Tourist Trade  -
atc> best movie ever seen!!! [DVD2DIVX by K 9].wmv
atc> Infringing Filesize: 1660760
atc> Infringer IP Address: 67.19.156.162
atc> Infringer DNS Name: 162.67-19-156.reverse.theplanet.com
atc> Infringing URL:
atc>
FastTrack:?ip=67.19.156.162&port=2081&sip=128.61.77.37&sport=1079&pip=24.3.1
.33&user=KazaaLiteK%2b%2b
